title: Hot wheels
creator_credit: Don McBrearty, Beryl Fox, ONF | NFB and McBrearty Film Productions
brief_description: A story where two girls turn down two boys for more prosperous dates. In anger, the teenage boys steal a car and after a drinking session accidentally meet up with the girls. The drivers of the two cars challenge each other to a race. A fictional film, dramatising a situation where pride, alcohol and wheels combine with disastrous results.
